price: 16. (Munaafiqiinta iyo gaaladaa xaalkoodu) waa sida Shaydaanka ku yidhaahda aadmiga: Gaalow. Markase uu gaaloobo, yidhaahda: Anigu barii baan kaa ahay,  anigu waxaan ka cabsan Alle, Rabbiga uumanka.
arabic: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ ٱكۡفُرۡ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kamathali al-shayṭāni idh qāla lil'insāni uk'fur falammā kafara qāla innī barīon minka innī akhāfu al-laha rabba al-ʿālamīna
